## IHidReport interface

HID report coming from a Jabra Sdk device.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export declare interface IHidReport 
```

## Remarks

See [https://usb.org](https://usb.org) for more information on the HID specifications.

## Properties

|  Property | Modifiers | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- | --- |
|  [id](./jabra-js.ihidreport.id.md) |  | [DeviceId](./jabra-js.deviceid.md) | The ID of the device which sent the report. |
|  [usage](./jabra-js.ihidreport.usage.md) |  | number | The HID usage ID of the report. |
|  [usagePage](./jabra-js.ihidreport.usagepage.md) |  | number | The HID usage page of the report. |
|  [value](./jabra-js.ihidreport.value.md) |  | number \| number\[\] | The values of the report. |

## Methods

|  Method | Description |
|  --- | --- |
|  [isArray()](./jabra-js.ihidreport.isarray.md) | Indicates if the values of the report come as an array or not. |
